skill.name: behaviors.skills.primitives.Heal
skill.description:
For an agent to know how to heal wounded victims within a set of 'Crowds' objects.
When several crowds should be healed, the agent acts on each crowd by following the order of the elements into the 'crowds' list.
Wounded victims from a crowd won't be healed if it could not reached (it has moved away or it is localized in a non accessible urban block).

parameter.name: crowds
parameter.description: The set of 'Crowd' objects to heal.

link.name: reach
link.description: To reach the crowds to heal.
